itemInfo.itemDesc: Taritas Helmet with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Taritas Helmet

item.name: Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall
item.desc: Energy of iron wall is contained within this Taritas Helmet\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall, Taritas Helmet of Iron wall, Steel Taritas Helmet, Taritas Helmet

item.name: Grade 3 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Taritas Helmet
item.desc: Armor worn by tough warriors. Morale boosting proverbs are written inside the armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Helmet

item.name: Taritas Helmet of Agility
item.desc: Energy of agility is contained within this Taritas Helmet\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Helmet of Agility, Taritas Helmet of Agility, Steel Taritas Helmet, Taritas Helmet

item.name: Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall
item.desc: Energy of iron wall is contained within this Taritas Helmet\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Helmet of Iron Wall, Taritas Helmet of Iron wall, Steel Taritas Helmet, Taritas Helmet

item.name: Taritas Helmet of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Taritas Helmet\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Helmet of Duress, Taritas Helmet of Duress, Steel Taritas Helmet, Taritas Helmet
